Package manageCatalog

Class newProductBuilderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • manageCatalog.newProductBuilderController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class newProductBuilderController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    newProductBuilderController is a controller class for the NewProduct FXML file is is used to create a new product or item to add to the catalog
    Author:
    Eitan
